horsentp.simpledrawing

Class DrawWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • horsentp.simpledrawing.DrawWindow

  • public class DrawWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    The DrawWindow object is to be a single, unified object that can be drawn on, and report user input.

    Should simplify game-making so that drawing and input should be setup by calling the constructor only.

    DrawWindow requires at least a 1 millisecond delay between input queue polling.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawWindow

        public DrawWindow(java.lang.String title,
          int drawingRegionWidth,
          int drawingRegionHeight,
          boolean fullscreen)
        Creates a non-resizeable DrawWindow that can report user input and be drawn on.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the window
        drawingRegionWidth - the width in pixels of the drawing region
        drawingRegionHeight - the height in pixels of the drawing region
        fullscreen - whether or not the DrawWindow should be in fullscreen.
